title: Ms. Menolly Mlkvy’s Milk Part Two
description: Once Ms. Menolly Mlkvy becomes Scott and Joanie’s lover, she quickly takes to nursing Joanie’s breasts on a regular basis and contemplates the best way to continue her relationship with them. It would be untoward for a young teacher to move in with a married couple, but surely there is something else she can do to cement their intimate nursing relationship…  This is an 11,000 word novella intended for adult audiences. Part two of two.  Content warning: features graphic sex, erotic lactation, group sex, adult nursing relationships, lesbian sex, and other depictions of adult sexuality. Explicit language and adult only content.  Excerpt:   Tom eagerly led the way back into the house. Once they found the bedroom, Menolly and Joanie collapsed onto the bed and began making out again. Menolly was more aggressive now, pulling at Joanie’s clothes, stripping them away.  Joanie pulled her lips away from Menolly’s. “Get your clothes off,” she ordered Tom. “It’s better when you’re naked.”  Tom hopped to the task. Menolly ignored him as he pulled off his clothes. She was more interested in Joanie’s silky panties.  Joanie watched Tom get naked. He had a nice body. She couldn’t say for certain how old he was. Maybe thirty? Maybe older. He was lean and had a fine scattering of hair over his chest that tapered down to a point across his stomach that quickly expanded to the small nest of dark blonde hair. Licking her lips Joanie said, “Bring that over here.”
author: Elliot Silvestri
